lines.gurmukhi: swgr mQq jYsy inksy AMmiRq ibKu praupkwr n ibkwr smsir hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saagar Madat Jaisay Nikasay Anmrit Bikhu , Paraoupakaar N Bikaar Samasari Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Churning of ocean produced nectar and poison. Despite coming out of the same ocean, the goodness of nectar and harm of poison is not the same.

lines.gurmukhi: ibKu Acvq hoq rqn ibnws kwl Acey AMmiRq mUey jIvq Amr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Bikhu Achavat Hot Ratan Binaas Kaala , Achaay Anmrit Mooay Jeevat Amar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Poison ends the jewel-like life whereas nectar resuscitates or revives the dead making him immortal.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qwro qwrI eyk lost sY pRgt huie bMD moK pdvI sMswr ibsQr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Taaro Taaree Ayk Losat Sai Pragat Hui , Bandh Mokh Padavee Sansaar Bisadar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the key and the lock are made of the same metal, but a lock results in bondage whereas a key frees the bonds.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI AswD swD sn Aau mjIT giq gurmiq durmiq tyvsY n tr hY ]162]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Asaadh Saadh San Au Majeetth Gati , Gurmati Duramati Tayvasai N Tar Hai ?162?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly a man does not give up his base wisdom but a person of Godly disposition never falters from the wisdom and teachings of the Guru. (162)
